title.1: Traditional Thai Massage in Wilmersdorf, Berlin

hero.p1: Welcome to Anavaree Thai Massage, where over 20 years of authentic Thai healing tradition meets personalized care in Berlin. Our certified therapist Khun Pui brings genuine techniques from Thailand's renowned Wat Po school to help you find relief from pain, stress, and tension through time-honored therapeutic massage.

services.title: Berlin's Favorite Thai Massage Therapies
services.text: From targeted pain relief to complete relaxation, these authentic Thai massage treatments are chosen by our clients for their proven therapeutic benefits.

items.heading: Thai Solution Massage
items.p: The 4+1 Thai Solution Massage (Nuad Benja Phakhi) is an advanced therapeutic technique developed by Master Sutep Mevattana of the THAIBOOST Academy. It combines traditional Thai massage, acupuncture, shiatsu, Tui Na, and physiology into a holistic treatment performed without oils or aids. Through acupressure using thumbs, palms, and knees, meridians and trigger points are activated to release energy blockages and alleviate ailments such as pain and migraines. The massage works on tendons, muscles, fascia, nerves, joints, and the skeletal system – while the practitioner cultivates a meditative Mettā state.

items.heading: Thai Ayuwattana Massage
items.p: The Thai Ayuwattana Massage is a therapeutic healing massage based on the Benja Phakhi 4+1 system for treating headaches, back, shoulder, and joint pain. As a specialized follow-up treatment to the Thai Solution Massage, it serves continuous health care, sustainable wellness management, and long-term pain prevention through regular therapeutic intervention.

items.heading: Traditional Thai Massage
items.p: Enjoy our signature oil-free Thai massage, beginning with energy line work to promote deep relaxation. Your therapist will focus on your specific areas of concern, making this ideal for stress relief and overall wellness.

whyChoose.title: Why Anavaree Thai Massage?
whyChoose.text: Experience the difference that authentic training, personalized care, and genuine Thai heritage make in your healing journey. At Anavaree Thai Massage, we combine traditional techniques passed down through generations with modern therapeutic understanding to deliver results that go beyond ordinary massage. Our family-run approach ensures every client receives individual attention in a welcoming, professional environment.

items.heading: Personalized Therapeutic Care
items.p: Family-run practice offering thorough consultations, fresh amenities, complimentary Thai tea, and detailed aftercare guidance. Every treatment is tailored to your specific wellness needs.

items.heading: Certified & Experienced
items.p: Over 20 years of professional experience with authentic certifications from Thailand's most respected massage institutions. Fully insured practice with comprehensive professional liability coverage.

items.heading: Authentic Thai Heritage
items.p: Khun Pui brings genuine Thai healing traditions from Northeast Thailand, trained at Bangkok's prestigious Wat Po Traditional Medical School - the birthplace of traditional Thai massage.

sideBySide.title: Meet Khun Pui & Family
sideBySide.text1: From Northeast Thailand to Wilmersdorf, Berlin, Khun Pui's journey began with a passion for traditional healing arts. Trained at Bangkok's prestigious Wat Po Traditional Medical School, she brings over 20 years of authentic Thai massage expertise to our practice.
sideBySide.text2: In September 2025, Anavaree Thai Massage was born as a true family enterprise, named after Pui's daughter who inspired her return to therapeutic practice. Today, we operate as a close-knit team dedicated to providing genuine healing through time-honored Thai traditions.

items.question: What should I expect during my first visit?
items.answer: Your first visit begins with a thorough consultation to discuss your health history, specific concerns, and treatment goals. We'll explain the chosen treatment and provide all necessary amenities, including disposable undergarments, robes, and slippers. All treatments include complimentary traditional Thai tea and detailed post-massage guidance for optimal benefits.

items.question: How often should I book treatments?
items.answer: Treatment frequency depends on your individual needs and goals. For general wellness and maintenance, monthly sessions work well. For specific conditions, chronic issues, or pain management, weekly treatments initially may be beneficial. We'll discuss the best schedule during your consultation based on your specific requirements.

items.question: What qualifications does Khun Pui have?
items.answer: Khun Pui holds extensive certifications, including Thai Traditional Massage from the prestigious Wat Po Traditional Medical School in Bangkok, Thailand. She has over 20 years of professional experience and authentic credentials from Thailand's most respected massage institutions. Our practice is fully insured with comprehensive professional liability coverage.

items.question: Do you offer parking?
items.answer: Yes, we provide paid street parking directly in front of our practice for your convenience. Additionally, complimentary parking is available on nearby streets in Wilmersdorf. Specific free parking locations will be provided when you book your appointment.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: Currently, we accept cash payments only. However, we are planning to introduce card payment options in the near future to provide more convenience for our clients. We recommend bringing cash for your treatment session.
